answers.answer: Depends a lot on your age. If you're young say 25 or less it can be part of increasing myopia, if you're 50 or older it could be due to early cataract formation. If you're diabetic it could be the diabetes control is not good.  Asky your "eye doctor"JCH MD

Eyes are not mechanical devices,instead it suits to present conditions,so wearing less powered glasses or exact power glasses will not progress myopia though wearing slightly less powered glasses is preferred.Eye surgeries,eye trauma,hereditary,other internal eye conditions etc all can contribute to myopia progression,Using eyes heavily for closer work too can contribute,but it can be eliminated by giving proper rest to eyes for example after 5-10 minutes look at far away objects for 30 sec, blinking eyes at least between 10 sec, closing eyelids at breaks etc.

question: Say that for a long period of time i have been wearing -4.5 glasses but my eye is -6.5, if i change my glasses to exactly -6.5 will my eye condition worsened?What are other common causes that cause myopia progression
title: Will my myopia worsened if i wear glasses that match my degree exactly
